dimensions.label: Creative Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will plan and organize creative projects in a systematic and methodical way.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and imagination to bring creative ideas to life.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use data and logical reasoning to break down and solve problems.
Your FarTwin will consider the big picture and look for innovative, outside-the-box solutions.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will write clearly and to the point, getting straight to the heart of the matter.
Your FarTwin will use elaborate language and detailed descriptions to convey their ideas.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach competitive situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly competitive and strive to win at all costs, sometimes becoming overly intense.
Your FarTwin will be determined but also able to bounce back from setbacks and maintain a positive attitude.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge and lead the team, sometimes coming across as bossy or controlling.
Your FarTwin will work closely with others, sharing ideas and expertise to achieve a common goal.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertain or high-stakes situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach risks with caution, weighing the potential benefits and drawbacks carefully.
Your FarTwin will take calculated risks and enjoy pushing boundaries to achieve their goals.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on achieving perfection in all aspects, sometimes leading to procrastination.
Your FarTwin will prioritize tasks based on importance and deadlines, staying organized and productive.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will keep their emotions hidden, only sharing them with close friends or family.
Your FarTwin will openly express their emotions, using humor and enthusiasm to connect with others.
